benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Strength or Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Push
effects: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with an attack that deals Bludgeoning damage, you can move it 5 feet to an unoccupied space if the target is no more than one size larger than you.

benefits.name: Enhanced Critical
effects: When you score a Critical Hit that deals Bludgeoning damage to a creature, attack rolls against that creature have Advantage until the start of your next turn.
